snippet: A disc jockey well known and well liked in New York City's music scene is attracting support and financial help after a bizarre accident in Oregon that nearly killed him.
abstract: A disc jockey well known and well liked in New York City's music scene is attracting support and financial help after a bizarre accident in Oregon that nearly killed him.

headline.main: Aid Coast to Coast for Injured Brooklyn D.J.
headline.print_headline: Aid Coast to Coast for a Hurt Brooklyn D.J.
